verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya kaila tabe pāda prakṣālana
gharera bhitare gelā karite bhojana

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kaila—performed; tabe—thereafter; pāda prakṣālana—washing the feet; gharera bhitare—within the room; gelā—entered; karite bhojana—to take lunch.
translation: After Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya washed the Lord's feet, the Lord entered the room to take His lunch.
